entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon then periods of snow. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 18 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3.
